faqs.answer: Plots are commonly available in 4 Marla, 6 Marla, 8 Marla, 10 Marla, 12 Marla, and 14 Marla sizes, depending on availability.

faqs.answer: Yes, residential plots in Lakkarpur allow independent house construction as per approved building norms.
